item.description: Coinbaseâ€™s bouncing QR code Super Bowl ad was so popular it crashed the app (2 minute read) Coinbase’s Super Bowl ad was so popular its app temporarily crashed.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-28
item.description: Apple will reportedly allow iPhones to accept contactless payments (2 minute read) Apple may soon be rolling out a feature that will let small businesses accept payments using their iPhones without any extra hardware.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-06
item.description: Apple Reportedly in Talks With Toyota About Apple Car Production Starting 2024 (2 minute read) Apple is rumored to be visiting several car manufacturers in Asia to mass-produce a branded car by 2024.
